DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Characterize Incidence EGFR Mutation Positive Advanced NSCLC Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria patients´ screening : Patients sex age 18 . Histologically confirm advanced metastatic NonSmallCell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) ( patient stage III B unsuitable locoregional treatment , stage IV ) . Chemo naïve patient ( NonSmallCell Lung Cancer patient receive first line systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy ) . Patients available tumoral tissue ( primary tumor metastatic area ) cytological sample include fine needle aspirate ( primary tumor metastatic area ) , bronchial alveolar lavage bronchial scraping pleural effusion . Patients grant write informed consent . Patients must fulfill inclusion criterion previously mention follow one order enrol study ( visit 1 ) followup progression 9 month begin treatment elapse : Inclusion Criteria patients´ followup Patients document positive mutation epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) ( M+ ) . Combined histology nonsmall cell small cell lung cancer .
DOC.keyword: Epidermal growth factor receptor ( EGFR ) positive mutation
